A4.text: On February 5, 2014, the NFL announced that CBS had acquired the partial rights to TNF for the 2014 season.

A5.text: In 2018, the rights shifted to Fox, through the 2022 season.

A7.text: Since 2022, Amazon holds the exclusive rights to broadcast the Thursday Night Football package.

A8.text: Amazon, through their Prime Video streaming service, is the exclusive carrier of the Thursday Night Football package.
